title: Techno Functional Tester (Manual and Automation)
description:
**Description**
* Banking and Financial Services domain knowledge is must \\& especially in Compliance (Screening, Payments, Regulatory Compliance) is Preferred.
* 4/5\\+ years of experience in functional/Automation Testing – Manual \\& Automation (Value addition)
* Understanding of T24 \\& Payments, writing SQL Queries would be value addition.
* Proficiency \\& working experience in Selenium automation development \\& Continuous Integration.
* Knowledge \\& working Experience on Programming Language like Java etc.
* Strong Self\\-Management and ready to work with stringent timelines.
* Candidate should be individual contributor \\& responsible for client delivery.
* Good communication skills \\& Client handling skills
* Working experience in Agile Methodology \\& Exposure to working on Agile projects
* Exposure to JIRA \\& Zephyr
* Hands on Experience On below deliverables:
* Automation/Manual Test Scenario Identification
* Requirement Traceability Matrix
* Automation/Manual Test Case Design
* Test Data Requirement \\& Setup
* Manual/Automation Execution –Automation Testing \\& Functional
* Defect Reporting
* Test Closure Report
* Walkthrough to business
* Daily Status Report

title: Zoho Developer
description:
This is a remote position
 



  




* Configure and implement 
 **Zoho One applications** 
  based on predefined workflows and instructions provided by management
* Set up modules, layouts, fields, pipelines, tags, and user roles in Zoho CRM
* Configure Zoho Desk departments, ticket categories, SLAs, automation rules, and email workflows
* Customize workflows, blueprints, assignment rules, alerts, and automation using Zoho’s built\\-in tools (no coding required)
* Assist in migrating and organizing client and application data into Zoho CRM
* Configure WhatsApp and email automation for client updates as per defined processes
* Create and maintain reports and dashboards for lead tracking, application status, and team performance
* Document system configurations and implementation steps for future reference and scalability
* Provide basic system support and troubleshooting for internal users and client firms
* Work closely with management to understand requirements and translate them into system configurations
* Test system functionality before handover to clients and ensure smooth implementation
* Support the onboarding of new clients using the Zoho system
* Continuously improve processes based on feedback and evolving business needs

title: Sr. SBC Developer
description:
**Description**
 Sangoma, a leader in business communications solutions, is looking for a highly skilled Sr. SBC Developer to join our dynamic team. As a reputable provider of Unified Communications as a Service (UCaaS) solutions, we are focused on delivering high\\-quality products that optimize voice and communication services for businesses around the globe. In this role, you will play a critical part in developing and enhancing our Session Border Controller (SBC) products, ensuring they meet the highest standards of performance and security.
   

  

 Your expertise in SBC technologies will drive our innovation and growth in the VoIP and telecommunications space. If you are passionate about developing cutting\\-edge solutions and making a significant impact in a fast\\-paced environment, we would love to hear from you.
   

  

**Your Role**
* Design and develop robust Session Border Controller solutions to facilitate secure and reliable VoIP communication.
* Manage the integration of SBC products with various telecommunication systems and services.
* Optimize performance and scalability of SBC applications through rigorous testing and debugging.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define product specifications and requirements.
* Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies to ensure our SBC solutions remain competitive.
* Participate in code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers on the team.


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Developer with a strong focus on Session Border Controllers (SBC).
* Expertise in VoIP protocols (e.g., SIP, RTP) and understanding of telecommunications architecture.
* Experience with programming languages such as C, C\\+\\+, or Java.
* Familiarity with network security protocols and best practices.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.


**Benefits**
* Paid Time Off


 Apply for this job
